column9: ProductDescription

Loose, micronized mineral powders have an exceptional silky texture. These powders form a protective barrier on the skin which promotes healing while allowing the skin to breathe. Key ingredients titanium dioxide and zinc oxide also provide non-irritating, natural sun protection.
